a bunch of fucking whiners that can't accept that a person can have an opinion that is different from yours while being just as valid and respectable without saying he just "tries to be different", this is such a toxic way to think and yet people can't recognise it because they're so eager to tell you you're wrong.

original_comment:
I am 4 years too late but I would argue that Runaway was never meant to be relatable. This album isn't supposed to be relatable. A lot of this album is Kanye admitting to all of the things people say he is but unapologetically admitting that he knows it's not really a good thing for everyone around him, but it's him and that's what he's going to be. The opening lines "She found pictures in my emails, I sent this bitch a picture of my dick, I don't know what it is with females, but I'm not too good at that shit." are so simple and stupid on purpose imo. He doesn't recognise these things as problems other than because of the fact it causes an issue with his partner when he's caught and becomes an issue that affects his life directly. He thinks I just sent a picture of my dick why is it such a big deal, he doesn't understand women but also admits that he knows it is clearly hurtful. He doesn't have anything clever or introspective to say, he just sent a picture of his dick and got caught. So that's exactly how he describes it.

I'm just talking out of my ass for an argument.
